subject: Re: [junit] XMLUnit: Namespace prefixes in XPaths
msgSnippet: ... I end up using http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-local-name (and http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-namespace-uri, if necessary). ...  ...
messageBody:
> I'm trying to use XMLUnit to check SOAP messages. There I'm stuck with
> the problem that most everything in such a message has a namespace
> prefix. Now I'm looking for a way to associate namespaces to prefixes
> in an XPath query.

I end up using http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-local-name
(and http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#function-namespace-uri, if necessary).

...
<nm:bob>
...
</nm:bob>
...

So the XPath becomes something like:

//*[local-name() = 'bob']

Not pretty, but it is the only mechanism that I have found for XPath.

Regards,
Peter.
